title: Lucky Stiff
description: Peter Lyles was unremarkable in life but unforgettable in death. After overdosing, Peter's friends almost bring him back to life, turning him into a zombie with the help of "sex-magic" Voodoo. His unforgettable adventure takes him from bedroom to bedroom, giving him a career as the hottest gigolo not quite alive, while he denies his hunger for human flesh. At times humorous, at times touching, but always sexy, sexy, sexy––Lucky Stiff will leave you wanting more. Peter's just that good.
author: Tonia Brown
